title: Question about the first strike border
body: So, I just heard about the first strike border and I just want to ask, let's say you bought the skin early and stuff and got the border. Can you still equip the border if you aren't using a project skin?

replies.body: Nope, the border will only show up for the PROJECT skin that you have purchased. For example, if you bought PROJECT: Zed, you will get the red fancy border and it will only show up when you use that skin.

This is correct. It only applies for the PROJECT skin you've purchased. Going off GameKingCaleb's example, if you use Shockblade Zed, you won't have the First Strike loading screen, even if you purchased PROJECT Zed.
